mapper.sql: id, name, host, port, admin_id AS adminId, parent_id AS parentId, contact_person AS contactPerson, contact_mobile AS contactMobile, portal_name AS portalName, logo, is_enabled AS enabled
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO organization (id, name, host, port, admin_id, parent_id, contact_person, contact_mobile, portal_name, logo) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{host}, #{port}, #{adminId}, #{parentId}, #{contactPerson}, #{contactMobile}, #{portalName}, #{logo})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = #{name}, host = #{host}, port = #{port}, admin_id = #{adminId}, parent_id = #{parentId}, contact_person = #{contactPerson}, contact_mobile = #{contactMobile}, portal_name = #{portalName}, logo = #{logo}, is_enabled = #{enabled}
mapper.update: UPDATE organization SET is_enabled = #{enabled} WHERE id = #{id}
